name: Escape Snow Globe
description:
You are trapped insiede a big giant snow globe, why? dunno... You have 5 minutes to run away from there or you will be killed by acid. Explore a small world. The thaw is your enemy.

Game size < 100MB
This is a prototype created for the #Unreal Jam

All the assets are created from scratch with Blender and Gimp exclusively for the Jam.

Unfortunaltely time wasn't enough to finish the game, only a minimal prototype is available, a better one will be release once the game is completed :)
